title.en: Yaotome no Kokoro no Naka no Ore ga Yabai Ken

description.en:
Aida, the most hated person in her class, was born with the ability to read people's minds. [i]"When you can read other people's minds, you just know for sure that they don't like you..."[/i] 

But one day, she reads the mind of Yaotome, the class committee member and the flower of the high school... and finds that her mind is filled with dirty fantasies of her and Aida!

[i]"Hey, isn't the me in your mind too erotic, Yaotome!?"[/i]
